status.name: ER_BUS_ERRORS
status.comment: Error code block for ALLJOYN wire protocol

status.name: ER_BUS_READ_ERROR
status.comment: Error attempting to read

status.name: ER_BUS_WRITE_ERROR
status.comment: Error attempting to write

status.name: ER_BUS_BAD_VALUE_TYPE
status.comment: Read an invalid value type

status.name: ER_BUS_BAD_HEADER_FIELD
status.comment: Read an invalid header field

status.name: ER_BUS_BAD_SIGNATURE
status.comment: Signature was badly formed

status.name: ER_BUS_BAD_OBJ_PATH
status.comment: Object path contained an illegal character

status.name: ER_BUS_BAD_MEMBER_NAME
status.comment: A member name contained an illegal character

status.name: ER_BUS_BAD_INTERFACE_NAME
status.comment: An interface name contained an illegal character

status.name: ER_BUS_BAD_ERROR_NAME
status.comment: An error name contained an illegal character

status.name: ER_BUS_BAD_BUS_NAME
status.comment: A bus name contained an illegal character

status.name: ER_BUS_NAME_TOO_LONG
status.comment: A name exceeded the permitted length

status.name: ER_BUS_BAD_LENGTH
status.comment: Length of an array was not a multiple of the array element size

status.name: ER_BUS_BAD_VALUE
status.comment: Parsed value in a message was invalid (for example: boolean > 1)

status.name: ER_BUS_BAD_HDR_FLAGS
status.comment: Unknown header flags

status.name: ER_BUS_BAD_BODY_LEN
status.comment: Body length was to long or too short

status.name: ER_BUS_BAD_HEADER_LEN
status.comment: Header length was to long or too short

status.name: ER_BUS_UNKNOWN_SERIAL
status.comment: Serial number in a method response was unknown

status.name: ER_BUS_UNKNOWN_PATH
status.comment: Path in a method call or signal was unknown

status.name: ER_BUS_UNKNOWN_INTERFACE
status.comment: Interface in a method call or signal was unknown

status.name: ER_BUS_ESTABLISH_FAILED
status.comment: Failed to establish a connection

status.name: ER_BUS_UNEXPECTED_SIGNATURE
status.comment: Signature in message was not what was expected

status.name: ER_BUS_INTERFACE_MISSING
status.comment: Interface header field is missing

status.name: ER_BUS_PATH_MISSING
status.comment: Object path header field is missing

status.name: ER_BUS_MEMBER_MISSING
status.comment: Member header field is missing

status.name: ER_BUS_REPLY_SERIAL_MISSING
status.comment: Reply-Serial header field is missing

status.name: ER_BUS_ERROR_NAME_MISSING
status.comment: Error Name header field is missing

status.name: ER_BUS_INTERFACE_NO_SUCH_MEMBER
status.comment: Interface does not have the requested member

status.name: ER_BUS_NO_SUCH_OBJECT
status.comment: Object does not exist

status.name: ER_BUS_OBJECT_NO_SUCH_MEMBER
status.comment: Object does not have the requested member (on any interface)

status.name: ER_BUS_OBJECT_NO_SUCH_INTERFACE
status.comment: Object does not have the requested interface

status.name: ER_BUS_NO_SUCH_INTERFACE
status.comment: Requested interface does not exist

status.name: ER_BUS_MEMBER_NO_SUCH_SIGNATURE
status.comment: Member exists but does not have the requested signature

status.name: ER_BUS_NOT_NUL_TERMINATED
status.comment: A string or signature was not NUL terminated

status.name: ER_BUS_NO_SUCH_PROPERTY
status.comment: No such property for a GET or SET operation

status.name: ER_BUS_SET_WRONG_SIGNATURE
status.comment: Attempt to set a property value with the wrong signature

status.name: ER_BUS_PROPERTY_VALUE_NOT_SET
status.comment: Attempt to get a property whose value has not been set

status.name: ER_BUS_PROPERTY_ACCESS_DENIED
status.comment: Attempt to set or get a property failed due to access rights

status.name: ER_BUS_NO_TRANSPORTS
status.comment: No physical message transports were specified

status.name: ER_BUS_BAD_TRANSPORT_ARGS
status.comment: Missing or badly formatted transports args specified

status.name: ER_BUS_NO_ROUTE
status.comment: Message cannot be routed to destination

status.name: ER_BUS_NO_ENDPOINT
status.comment: An endpoint with given name cannot be found

status.name: ER_BUS_BAD_SEND_PARAMETER
status.comment: Bad parameter in send message call

status.name: ER_BUS_UNMATCHED_REPLY_SERIAL
status.comment: Serial number in method call reply message did not match any method calls

status.name: ER_BUS_BAD_SENDER_ID
status.comment: Sender identifier is invalid

status.name: ER_BUS_TRANSPORT_NOT_STARTED
status.comment: Attempt to send on a transport that has not been started

status.name: ER_BUS_EMPTY_MESSAGE
status.comment: Attempt to deliver an empty message

status.name: ER_BUS_NOT_OWNER
status.comment: A bus name operation was not permitted because sender does not own name

status.name: ER_BUS_SET_PROPERTY_REJECTED
status.comment: Application rejected a request to set a property

status.name: ER_BUS_CONNECT_FAILED
status.comment: Connection failed

status.name: ER_BUS_REPLY_IS_ERROR_MESSAGE
status.comment: Response from a method call was an ERROR message

status.name: ER_BUS_NOT_AUTHENTICATING
status.comment: Not in an authentication conversation

status.name: ER_BUS_NO_LISTENER
status.comment: A listener is required to implement the requested function

status.name: ER_BUS_NOT_ALLOWED
status.comment: The operation attempted is not allowed

status.name: ER_BUS_WRITE_QUEUE_FULL
status.comment: Write failed because write queue is full

status.name: ER_BUS_ENDPOINT_CLOSING
status.comment: Operation not permitted on endpoint in process of closing

status.name: ER_BUS_INTERFACE_MISMATCH
status.comment: Received two conflicting definitions for the same interface

status.name: ER_BUS_MEMBER_ALREADY_EXISTS
status.comment: Attempt to add a member to an interface that already exists

status.name: ER_BUS_PROPERTY_ALREADY_EXISTS
status.comment: Attempt to add a property to an interface that already exists

status.name: ER_BUS_IFACE_ALREADY_EXISTS
status.comment: Attempt to add an interface to an object that already exists

status.name: ER_BUS_ERROR_RESPONSE
status.comment: Received an error response to a method call

status.name: ER_BUS_BAD_XML
status.comment: XML data is improperly formatted

status.name: ER_BUS_BAD_CHILD_PATH
status.comment: The path of a child object is incorrect given it's parent's path

status.name: ER_BUS_OBJ_ALREADY_EXISTS
status.comment: Attempt to add a RemoteObject child that already exists

status.name: ER_BUS_OBJ_NOT_FOUND
status.comment: Object with given path does not exist

status.name: ER_BUS_CANNOT_EXPAND_MESSAGE
status.comment: Expansion information for a compressed message is not available

status.name: ER_BUS_NOT_COMPRESSED
status.comment: Attempt to expand a message that is not compressed

status.name: ER_BUS_ALREADY_CONNECTED
status.comment: Attempt to connect to a bus which is already connected

status.name: ER_BUS_NOT_CONNECTED
status.comment: Attempt to use a bus attachment that is not connected to a router

status.name: ER_BUS_ALREADY_LISTENING
status.comment: Attempt to listen on a bus address which is already being listened on

status.name: ER_BUS_KEY_UNAVAILABLE
status.comment: The request key is not available

status.name: ER_BUS_TRUNCATED
status.comment: Insufficient memory to copy data

status.name: ER_BUS_KEY_STORE_NOT_LOADED
status.comment: Accessing the key store before it is loaded

status.name: ER_BUS_NO_AUTHENTICATION_MECHANISM
status.comment: There is no authentication mechanism

status.name: ER_BUS_BUS_ALREADY_STARTED
status.comment: Bus has already been started

status.name: ER_BUS_BUS_NOT_STARTED
status.comment: Bus has not yet been started

status.name: ER_BUS_KEYBLOB_OP_INVALID
status.comment: The operation requested cannot be performed using this key blob

status.name: ER_BUS_INVALID_HEADER_CHECKSUM
status.comment: Invalid header checksum in an encrypted message

status.name: ER_BUS_MESSAGE_NOT_ENCRYPTED
status.comment: Security policy requires the message to be encrypted

status.name: ER_BUS_INVALID_HEADER_SERIAL
status.comment: Serial number in message header is invalid

status.name: ER_BUS_TIME_TO_LIVE_EXPIRED
status.comment: Message time-to-live has expired

status.name: ER_BUS_HDR_EXPANSION_INVALID
status.comment: Something is wrong with a header expansion

status.name: ER_BUS_MISSING_COMPRESSION_TOKEN
status.comment: Compressed headers require a compression token

status.name: ER_BUS_NO_PEER_GUID
status.comment: There is no GUID for this peer

status.name: ER_BUS_MESSAGE_DECRYPTION_FAILED
status.comment: Message decryption failed

status.name: ER_BUS_SECURITY_FATAL
status.comment: A fatal security failure

status.name: ER_BUS_KEY_EXPIRED
status.comment: An encryption key has expired

status.name: ER_BUS_CORRUPT_KEYSTORE
status.comment: Key store is corrupt

status.name: ER_BUS_NO_CALL_FOR_REPLY
status.comment: A reply only allowed in response to a method call

status.name: ER_BUS_NOT_A_COMPLETE_TYPE
status.comment: Signature must be a single complete type

status.name: ER_BUS_POLICY_VIOLATION
status.comment: Message does not meet policy restrictions

status.name: ER_BUS_NO_SUCH_SERVICE
status.comment: Service name is unknown

status.name: ER_BUS_TRANSPORT_NOT_AVAILABLE
status.comment: Transport cannot be used due to underlying mechanism disabled by OS

status.name: ER_BUS_INVALID_AUTH_MECHANISM
status.comment: Authentication mechanism is not valid

status.name: ER_BUS_KEYSTORE_VERSION_MISMATCH
status.comment: Key store has wrong version number

status.name: ER_BUS_BLOCKING_CALL_NOT_ALLOWED
status.comment: A synchronous method call from within handler is not permitted.

status.name: ER_BUS_SIGNATURE_MISMATCH
status.comment: MsgArg(s) do not match signature.

status.name: ER_BUS_STOPPING
status.comment: The bus is stopping.

status.name: ER_BUS_METHOD_CALL_ABORTED
status.comment: The method call was aborted.

status.name: ER_BUS_CANNOT_ADD_INTERFACE
status.comment: An interface cannot be added to an object that is already registered.

status.name: ER_BUS_CANNOT_ADD_HANDLER
status.comment: A method handler cannot be added to an object that is already registered.

status.name: ER_BUS_KEYSTORE_NOT_LOADED
status.comment: Key store has not been loaded

status.name: ER_BUS_NO_SUCH_HANDLE
status.comment: Handle is not in the handle table

status.name: ER_BUS_HANDLES_NOT_ENABLED
status.comment: Passing of handles is not enabled for this connection

status.name: ER_BUS_HANDLES_MISMATCH
status.comment: Message had more handles than expected

status.name: ER_BUS_NO_SESSION
status.comment: Session id is not valid

status.name: ER_BUS_ELEMENT_NOT_FOUND
status.comment: Dictionary element was not found

status.name: ER_BUS_NOT_A_DICTIONARY
status.comment: MsgArg was not an array of dictionary elements

status.name: ER_BUS_WAIT_FAILED
status.comment: Wait failed

status.name: ER_BUS_BAD_SESSION_OPTS
status.comment: Session options are bad or incompatible

status.name: ER_BUS_CONNECTION_REJECTED
status.comment: Incoming connection rejected

status.name: ER_DBUS_REQUEST_NAME_REPLY_PRIMARY_OWNER
status.comment: RequestName reply: Name was successfully obtained

status.name: ER_DBUS_REQUEST_NAME_REPLY_IN_QUEUE
status.comment: RequestName reply: Name is already owned, request for name has been queued

status.name: ER_DBUS_REQUEST_NAME_REPLY_EXISTS
status.comment: RequestName reply: Name is already owned and DO_NOT_QUEUE was specified in request

status.name: ER_DBUS_REQUEST_NAME_REPLY_ALREADY_OWNER
status.comment: RequestName reply: Name is already owned by this endpoint

status.name: ER_DBUS_RELEASE_NAME_REPLY_RELEASED
status.comment: ReleaseName reply: Name was released

status.name: ER_DBUS_RELEASE_NAME_REPLY_NON_EXISTENT
status.comment: ReleaseName reply: Name does not exist

status.name: ER_DBUS_RELEASE_NAME_REPLY_NOT_OWNER
status.comment: ReleaseName reply: Request to release name that is not owned by this endpoint

status.name: ER_DBUS_START_REPLY_ALREADY_RUNNING
status.comment: StartServiceByName reply: Service is already running

status.name: ER_ALLJOYN_BINDSESSIONPORT_REPLY_ALREADY_EXISTS
status.comment: BindSessionPort reply: SessionPort already exists

status.name: ER_ALLJOYN_BINDSESSIONPORT_REPLY_FAILED
status.comment: BindSessionPort reply: Failed

status.name: ER_ALLJOYN_JOINSESSION_REPLY_NO_SESSION
status.comment: JoinSession reply: Session with given name does not exist

status.name: ER_ALLJOYN_JOINSESSION_REPLY_UNREACHABLE
status.comment: JoinSession reply: Failed to find suitable transport

status.name: ER_ALLJOYN_JOINSESSION_REPLY_CONNECT_FAILED
status.comment: JoinSession reply: Connect to advertised address

status.name: ER_ALLJOYN_JOINSESSION_REPLY_REJECTED
status.comment: JoinSession reply: The session creator rejected the join req

status.name: ER_ALLJOYN_JOINSESSION_REPLY_BAD_SESSION_OPTS
status.comment: JoinSession reply: Failed due to session option incompatibilities

status.name: ER_ALLJOYN_JOINSESSION_REPLY_FAILED
status.comment: JoinSession reply: Failed for unknown reason

status.name: ER_ALLJOYN_LEAVESESSION_REPLY_NO_SESSION
status.comment: LeaveSession reply: Session with given name does not exist

status.name: ER_ALLJOYN_LEAVESESSION_REPLY_FAILED
status.comment: LeaveSession reply: Failed for unspecified reason

status.name: ER_ALLJOYN_ADVERTISENAME_REPLY_TRANSPORT_NOT_AVAILABLE
status.comment: AdvertiseName reply: The specified transport is unavailable for advertising

status.name: ER_ALLJOYN_ADVERTISENAME_REPLY_ALREADY_ADVERTISING
status.comment: AdvertiseName reply: This endpoint is already advertising this name

status.name: ER_ALLJOYN_ADVERTISENAME_REPLY_FAILED
status.comment: AdvertiseName reply: Advertise failed

status.name: ER_ALLJOYN_CANCELADVERTISENAME_REPLY_FAILED
status.comment: CancelAdvertiseName reply: Advertise failed

status.name: ER_ALLJOYN_FINDADVERTISEDNAME_REPLY_TRANSPORT_NOT_AVAILABLE
status.comment: FindAdvertisedName reply: The specified transport is unavailable for discovery

status.name: ER_ALLJOYN_FINDADVERTISEDNAME_REPLY_ALREADY_DISCOVERING
status.comment: FindAdvertisedName reply: This endpoint is already discovering this name

status.name: ER_ALLJOYN_FINDADVERTISEDNAME_REPLY_FAILED
status.comment: FindAdvertisedName reply: Failed

status.name: ER_ALLJOYN_CANCELFINDADVERTISEDNAME_REPLY_FAILED
status.comment: CancelFindAdvertisedName reply: Failed

status.name: ER_BUS_UNEXPECTED_DISPOSITION
status.comment: An unexpected disposition was returned and has been treated as an error

status.name: ER_BUS_INTERFACE_ACTIVATED
status.comment: An InterfaceDescription cannot be modified once activated

status.name: ER_ALLJOYN_UNBINDSESSIONPORT_REPLY_BAD_PORT
status.comment: UnbindSessionPort reply: SessionPort does not exist

status.name: ER_ALLJOYN_UNBINDSESSIONPORT_REPLY_FAILED
status.comment: UnbindSessionPort reply: Failed

status.name: ER_ALLJOYN_BINDSESSIONPORT_REPLY_INVALID_OPTS
status.comment: BindSessionPort reply: SessionOpts are invalid

status.name: ER_ALLJOYN_JOINSESSION_REPLY_ALREADY_JOINED
status.comment: JoinSession reply: Caller has already joined the session

status.name: ER_BUS_SELF_CONNECT
status.comment: Received BusHello from self

status.name: ER_BUS_SECURITY_NOT_ENABLED
status.comment: Security is not enabled for this bus attachment

status.name: ER_BUS_LISTENER_ALREADY_SET
status.comment: A listener has already been set

status.name: ER_BUS_PEER_AUTH_VERSION_MISMATCH
status.comment: Incompatible peer authentication version numbers

status.name: ER_ALLJOYN_SETLINKTIMEOUT_REPLY_NOT_SUPPORTED
status.comment: Local router does not support SetLinkTimeout

status.name: ER_ALLJOYN_SETLINKTIMEOUT_REPLY_NO_DEST_SUPPORT
status.comment: SetLinkTimeout not supported by destination

status.name: ER_ALLJOYN_SETLINKTIMEOUT_REPLY_FAILED
status.comment: SetLinkTimeout failed

status.name: ER_ALLJOYN_ACCESS_PERMISSION_WARNING
status.comment: No permission to use Wifi

status.name: ER_ALLJOYN_ACCESS_PERMISSION_ERROR
status.comment: No permission to access peer service

status.name: ER_BUS_DESTINATION_NOT_AUTHENTICATED
status.comment: Cannot send a signal to a destination that is not authenticated

status.name: ER_BUS_ENDPOINT_REDIRECTED
status.comment: Endpoint was redirected to another address

status.name: ER_BUS_AUTHENTICATION_PENDING
status.comment: Authentication of remote peer is pending

status.name: ER_BUS_NOT_AUTHORIZED
status.comment: Operation was not authorized

status.name: ER_PACKET_BUS_NO_SUCH_CHANNEL
status.comment: Received packet for unknown channel

status.name: ER_PACKET_BAD_FORMAT
status.comment: Received packet with incorrect header information

status.name: ER_PACKET_CONNECT_TIMEOUT
status.comment: Timed out waiting for connect response

status.name: ER_PACKET_CHANNEL_FAIL
status.comment: Failed to create new comm channel

status.name: ER_PACKET_TOO_LARGE
status.comment: Message too large for use with packet based transport

status.name: ER_PACKET_BAD_PARAMETER
status.comment: Invalid PacketEngine control packet received

status.name: ER_PACKET_BAD_CRC
status.comment: Packet has invalid CRC

status.name: ER_RENDEZVOUS_SERVER_DEACTIVATED_USER
status.comment: Rendezvous Server has deactivated the current user. Register with the Rendezvous Server to continue.

status.name: ER_RENDEZVOUS_SERVER_UNKNOWN_USER
status.comment: Rendezvous Server does not recognize the current user. Register with the Rendezvous Server to continue.

status.name: ER_UNABLE_TO_CONNECT_TO_RENDEZVOUS_SERVER
status.comment: Unable to connect to the Rendezvous Server

status.name: ER_NOT_CONNECTED_TO_RENDEZVOUS_SERVER
status.comment: Not connected to the Rendezvous Server

status.name: ER_UNABLE_TO_SEND_MESSAGE_TO_RENDEZVOUS_SERVER
status.comment: Unable to send message to the Rendezvous Server

status.name: ER_INVALID_RENDEZVOUS_SERVER_INTERFACE_MESSAGE
status.comment: Invalid Rendezvous Server interface message

status.name: ER_INVALID_PERSISTENT_CONNECTION_MESSAGE_RESPONSE
status.comment: Invalid message response received over the Persistent connection with the Rendezvous Server

status.name: ER_INVALID_ON_DEMAND_CONNECTION_MESSAGE_RESPONSE
status.comment: Invalid message response received over the On Demand connection with the Rendezvous Server

status.name: ER_INVALID_HTTP_METHOD_USED_FOR_RENDEZVOUS_SERVER_INTERFACE_MESSAGE
status.comment: Invalid HTTP method type used for Rendezvous Server interface message

status.name: ER_RENDEZVOUS_SERVER_ERR500_INTERNAL_ERROR
status.comment: Received a HTTP 500 status code from the Rendezvous Server. This indicates an internal error in the Server

status.name: ER_RENDEZVOUS_SERVER_ERR503_STATUS_UNAVAILABLE
status.comment: Received a HTTP 503 status code from the Rendezvous Server. This indicates unavailability of the Server error state

status.name: ER_RENDEZVOUS_SERVER_ERR401_UNAUTHORIZED_REQUEST
status.comment: Received a HTTP 401 status code from the Rendezvous Server. This indicates that the client is unauthorized to send a request to the Server. The Client login procedure must be initiated.

status.name: ER_RENDEZVOUS_SERVER_UNRECOVERABLE_ERROR
status.comment: Received a HTTP status code indicating unrecoverable error from the Rendezvous Server. The connection with the Server should be re-established.

status.name: ER_RENDEZVOUS_SERVER_ROOT_CERTIFICATE_UNINITIALIZED
status.comment: Rendezvous Server root ceritificate uninitialized.

status.name: ER_BUS_NO_SUCH_ANNOTATION
status.comment: No such annotation for a GET or SET operation

status.name: ER_BUS_ANNOTATION_ALREADY_EXISTS
status.comment: Attempt to add an annotation to an interface or property that already exists

status.name: ER_SOCK_CLOSING
status.comment: Socket close in progress

status.name: ER_NO_SUCH_DEVICE
status.comment: A referenced device cannot be located

status.name: ER_P2P
status.comment: An error occurred in a Wi-Fi Direct helper method call

status.name: ER_P2P_TIMEOUT
status.comment: A timeout occurred in a Wi-Fi Direct helper method call

status.name: ER_P2P_NOT_CONNECTED
status.comment: A required Wi-Fi Direct network connection does not exist

status.name: ER_BAD_TRANSPORT_MASK
status.comment: Exactly one mask bit was not set in the provided TransportMask

status.name: ER_PROXIMITY_CONNECTION_ESTABLISH_FAIL
status.comment: Fail to establish P2P proximity connection

status.name: ER_PROXIMITY_NO_PEERS_FOUND
status.comment: Cannot find proximity P2P peers

status.name: ER_BUS_OBJECT_NOT_REGISTERED
status.comment: Operation not permitted on unregistered bus object

status.name: ER_P2P_DISABLED
status.comment: Wi-Fi Direct is disabled on the device

status.name: ER_P2P_BUSY
status.comment: Wi-Fi Direct resources are in busy state

status.name: ER_BUS_INCOMPATIBLE_DAEMON
status.comment: The router version is too old to be used by this client

status.name: ER_P2P_NO_GO
status.comment: Attempt to execute a Wi-Fi Direct GO-related operation while STA

status.name: ER_P2P_NO_STA
status.comment: Attempt to execute a Wi-Fi Direct STA-related operation while GO

status.name: ER_P2P_FORBIDDEN
status.comment: Attempt to execute a forbidden Wi-Fi Direct operation

status.name: ER_ALLJOYN_ONAPPSUSPEND_REPLY_FAILED
status.comment: OnAppSuspend reply: Failed

status.name: ER_ALLJOYN_ONAPPSUSPEND_REPLY_UNSUPPORTED
status.comment: OnAppSuspend reply: Unsupported operation

status.name: ER_ALLJOYN_ONAPPRESUME_REPLY_FAILED
status.comment: OnAppResume reply: Failed

status.name: ER_ALLJOYN_ONAPPRESUME_REPLY_UNSUPPORTED
status.comment: OnAppResume reply: Unsupported operation

status.name: ER_BUS_NO_SUCH_MESSAGE
status.comment: Message not found

status.name: ER_ALLJOYN_REMOVESESSIONMEMBER_REPLY_NO_SESSION
status.comment: RemoveSessionMember reply: Specified session Id with this endpoint was not found

status.name: ER_ALLJOYN_REMOVESESSIONMEMBER_NOT_BINDER
status.comment: RemoveSessionMember reply: Endpoint is not the binder of session

status.name: ER_ALLJOYN_REMOVESESSIONMEMBER_NOT_MULTIPOINT
status.comment: RemoveSessionMember reply: Session is not multipoint

status.name: ER_ALLJOYN_REMOVESESSIONMEMBER_NOT_FOUND
status.comment: RemoveSessionMember reply: Specified session member was not found

status.name: ER_ALLJOYN_REMOVESESSIONMEMBER_INCOMPATIBLE_REMOTE_DAEMON
status.comment: RemoveSessionMember reply: The remote router does not support this feature

status.name: ER_ALLJOYN_REMOVESESSIONMEMBER_REPLY_FAILED
status.comment: RemoveSessionMember reply: Failed for unspecified reason

status.name: ER_BUS_REMOVED_BY_BINDER
status.comment: The session member was removed by the binder

status.name: ER_BUS_MATCH_RULE_NOT_FOUND
status.comment: The match rule was not found

status.name: ER_ALLJOYN_PING_FAILED
status.comment: Ping failed

status.name: ER_ALLJOYN_PING_REPLY_UNREACHABLE
status.comment: Name pinged is unreachable

status.name: ER_UDP_MSG_TOO_LONG
status.comment: The message is too long to transmit over the UDP transport

status.name: ER_UDP_DEMUX_NO_ENDPOINT
status.comment: Tried to demux the callback but found no endpoint for the connection

status.name: ER_UDP_NO_NETWORK
status.comment: Not listening on network implied by IP address

status.name: ER_UDP_UNEXPECTED_LENGTH
status.comment: Request for more bytes than are in the underlying datagram

status.name: ER_UDP_UNEXPECTED_FLOW
status.comment: The data flow type of the endpoint has an unexpected value

status.name: ER_UDP_DISCONNECT
status.comment: Unexpected disconnect occurred

status.name: ER_UDP_NOT_IMPLEMENTED
status.comment: Feature not implemented for the UDP transport

status.name: ER_UDP_NO_LISTENER
status.comment: Discovery started with no listener to receive callbacks

status.name: ER_UDP_STOPPING
status.comment: Attempt to use UDP when transport stopping

status.name: ER_ARDP_BACKPRESSURE
status.comment: ARDP is applying backpressure -- send window is full

status.name: ER_UDP_BACKPRESSURE
status.comment: UDP is applying backpressure to ARDP -- queue is full

status.name: ER_ARDP_INVALID_STATE
status.comment: Current ARDP state does not allow attempted operation

status.name: ER_ARDP_TTL_EXPIRED
status.comment: Time-To-Live of ARDP segment has expired

status.name: ER_ARDP_PERSIST_TIMEOUT
status.comment: Remote endpoint stopped consuming data -- send window is full

status.name: ER_ARDP_PROBE_TIMEOUT
status.comment: ARDP link timeout

status.name: ER_ARDP_REMOTE_CONNECTION_RESET
status.comment: Remote endpoint disconected: sent RST

status.name: ER_UDP_BUSHELLO
status.comment: UDP Transport is unable to complete an operation relating to a BusHello Message

status.name: ER_UDP_MESSAGE
status.comment: UDP Transport is unable to complete an operation on an AllJoyn Message

status.name: ER_UDP_INVALID
status.comment: UDP Transport detected invalid data or parameters from network

status.name: ER_UDP_UNSUPPORTED
status.comment: UDP Transport does not support the indicated operation or type

status.name: ER_UDP_ENDPOINT_STALLED
status.comment: UDP Transport has detected an endpoint that is not terminating correctly

status.name: ER_ARDP_INVALID_RESPONSE
status.comment: ARDP Transport detected invalid message data that causes disconnect

status.name: ER_ARDP_INVALID_CONNECTION
status.comment: ARDP connection not found

status.name: ER_UDP_LOCAL_DISCONNECT
status.comment: UDP Transport connection (intentionally) disconnected on local side

status.name: ER_UDP_EARLY_EXIT
status.comment: UDP Transport connection aborted during setup

status.name: ER_UDP_LOCAL_DISCONNECT_FAIL
status.comment: UDP Transport local connection disconnect failure

status.name: ER_ARDP_DISCONNECTING
status.comment: ARDP connection is being shut down

status.name: ER_ALLJOYN_PING_REPLY_INCOMPATIBLE_REMOTE_ROUTING_NODE
status.comment: Remote routing node does not implement Ping

status.name: ER_ALLJOYN_PING_REPLY_TIMEOUT
status.comment: Ping call timeout

status.name: ER_ALLJOYN_PING_REPLY_UNKNOWN_NAME
status.comment: Name not found currently or part of any known session

status.name: ER_ALLJOYN_PING_REPLY_FAILED
status.comment: Generic Ping call error

status.name: ER_TCP_MAX_UNTRUSTED
status.comment: The maximum configured number of Thin Library connections has been reached

status.name: ER_ALLJOYN_PING_REPLY_IN_PROGRESS
status.comment: A ping request for same name is already in progress

status.name: ER_LANGUAGE_NOT_SUPPORTED
status.comment: The language requested is not supported

status.name: ER_ABOUT_FIELD_ALREADY_SPECIFIED
status.comment: A field using the same name is already specified.

status.name: ER_UDP_NOT_DISCONNECTED
status.comment: A UDP stream was found to be connected during teardown

status.name: ER_UDP_ENDPOINT_NOT_STARTED
status.comment: Attempt to send on a UDP endpoint that is not started

status.name: ER_UDP_ENDPOINT_REMOVED
status.comment: Attempt to send on a UDP endpoint that has been removed

status.name: ER_ARDP_VERSION_NOT_SUPPORTED
status.comment: Specified version of ARDP Protocol is not supported

status.name: ER_CONNECTION_LIMIT_EXCEEDED
status.comment: Connection rejected due to configured connection limits

status.name: ER_ARDP_WRITE_BLOCKED
status.comment: ARDP cannot write to UDP socket (queue is full)

status.name: ER_PERMISSION_DENIED
status.comment: Permission denied

status.name: ER_ABOUT_DEFAULT_LANGUAGE_NOT_SPECIFIED
status.comment: Default language must be specified before setting a localized field

status.name: ER_ABOUT_SESSIONPORT_NOT_BOUND
status.comment: Unable to announce session port that is not bound to the BusAttachment

status.name: ER_ABOUT_ABOUTDATA_MISSING_REQUIRED_FIELD
status.comment: The AboutData is missing a required field.

status.name: ER_ABOUT_INVALID_ABOUTDATA_LISTENER
status.comment: The AboutDataListener returns invalid data. Most likely cause: the announced data does not match with non-announced data.

status.name: ER_BUS_PING_GROUP_NOT_FOUND
status.comment: Ping group did not exist

status.name: ER_BUS_REMOVED_BY_BINDER_SELF
status.comment: The self-joined session member was removed by the binder

status.name: ER_INVALID_CONFIG
status.comment: Invalid configuration item or combination of items detected

status.name: ER_ABOUT_INVALID_ABOUTDATA_FIELD_VALUE
status.comment: General error indicating the value given for an About Data field is invalid.

status.name: ER_ABOUT_INVALID_ABOUTDATA_FIELD_APPID_SIZE
status.comment: Error indicating the AppId field is not a 128-bit bite array.
